comments.raw_text:
STEPS TO REPRODUCE:
 1. Load http://vid.ly
 2. Enter in code HNY2011 (from Mozilla Hacks article*) and press enter

ACTUAL RESULTS:
This assertion-failure:
> ###!!! ASSERTION: forgot to short-circuit a text run with zero-sized font?: 'GetStyle()->size != 0', file ../../../mozilla/gfx/thebes/gfxFT2FontBase.cpp, line 184
followed by 7 copies of this related-looking warning:
> WARNING: Negative deltawidth, something odd is happening: 'result.mDeltaWidth >= 0', file layout/generic/nsTextFrameThebes.cpp, line 7012


* http://hacks.mozilla.org/2011/01/simple-html5-video-encoding-with-vid-ly-interview-first-impressions-and-invite-code/
